org.hibernate.search.bridge.util.impl

Interface BridgeAdaptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullEncodingFieldBridge, NullEncodingTwoWayFieldBridge, String2FieldBridgeAdaptor, TwoWayString2FieldBridgeAdaptor, TwoWayString2FieldBridgeIgnoreAnalyzerAdaptor

    public interface BridgeAdaptor
    An interface for bridge adaptors, i.e. types exposing one bridge interface and using another bridge instance under the hood.

    Implementing this interface allows BridgeAdaptorUtils to detect specific bridge interfaces (TwoWayStringBridge, IgnoreAnalyzerBridge, ...) even when the adaptor does no re-implement the interface.

    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T unwrap(Class<T> bridgeClass)
      Return an object of the specified type to allow access to specific bridge interfaces.

    • Method Detail

      • unwrap

        <T> T unwrap(Class<T> bridgeClass)
        Return an object of the specified type to allow access to specific bridge interfaces.

        If no adapted bridge matches this type, null is returned.

        Returns:
        An instance of the specified class, or null if there is none.
